English: I am going to the park with my friends.
French: J'ai des amis et je vais au parc.

English: My sister is studying for her exams this weekend.
French: Ma soeur se prépare pour ses examens ce week-end.

English: My parents are going to visit their friends in the country.
French: Mes parents vont visiter leurs amis dans le pays.

English: We are having a family dinner tonight.
French: Nous avons un dîner familial ce soir.

English: My grandparents live in the countryside.
French: Mes grands-parents habitent dans la campagne.
